page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF R. HALL
page.content: Saturday 8th June 1985 At 8am I got up and went down stairs to watch television. I stayed downstairs for half an hour before I went up again and got dressed. I put on shirt, shorts and a tracksuit. At 9am I had toast for breakfast while I watched television, and at 9.30am we went in the car to Chester to have my tennis lesson. I was back by 11.30am. Some friends from Sheffield came. We chatted and had coffee until 1pm when we had lunch.Mum cooked a roast pork dinner. At 3.30pm we went for a walk up the hill and were back for 4.30. We had a cup of tea and after I played on my computer until 6.30pm. Then my mum and dad went out for a meal, I went to a friends to watch a film on his video. I had sausage and chips there, watching TV until Mum and Dad came back at 10pm. I went to bed at 10.30pm
